channelId.description: The channel this message belongs to.

messageId.description: The unique ID of this message.

code.description: The code representing a message type or category.

senderId.description: Message sender, usually a user ID.

username.description: The username of the message sender, if any.

createTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the message was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the message was last updated.

persistent.description: True if the message was persisted to the channel's history, false otherwise.

roomName.description: The name of the chat room, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a chat room.

groupId.description: The ID of the group, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a group channel.

userIdOne.description: The ID of the first DM user, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a DM chat.

userIdTwo.description: The ID of the second DM user, or an empty string if this message was not sent through a DM chat.

apiChannelMessage.description: A message sent on a channel.

nextCursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prevCursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

cacheableCursor.description: Cacheable cursor to list newer messages. Durable and designed to be stored, unlike next/prev cursors.

apiChannelMessageList.description: A list of channel messages, usually a result of a list operation.

name.description: A unique name for the group.

langTag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

avatarUrl.description: A URL for an avatar image.

open.description: Mark a group as open or not where only admins can accept members.

apiCreateGroupRequest.description: Create a group with the current user as owner.

collection.description: The collection which stores the object.

key.description: The key of the object within the collection.

version.description: The version hash of the object.

name.description: An event name, type, category, or identifier.

timestamp.description: The time when the event was triggered.

external.description: True if the event came directly from a client call, false otherwise.

apiEvent.description: Represents an event to be passed through the server to registered event handlers.

updateTime.description: Time of the latest relationship update.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

apiFriendList.description: A collection of zero or more friends of the user.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

apiFriendsOfFriendsList.title: A List of friends of friends

creatorId.description: The id of the user who created the group.

name.description: The unique name of the group.

langTag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

avatarUrl.description: A URL for an avatar image.

open.description: Anyone can join open groups, otherwise only admins can accept members.

edgeCount.description: The current count of all members in the group.

maxCount.description: The maximum number of members allowed.

createTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the group was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the group was last updated.

cursor.description: A cursor used to get the next page.

apiGroupList.description: One or more groups returned from a listing operation.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

apiGroupUserList.description: A list of users belonging to a group, along with their role.

leaderboardId.description: The ID of the leaderboard this score belongs to.

ownerId.description: The ID of the score owner, usually a user or group.

username.description: The username of the score owner, if the owner is a user.

numScore.description: The number of submissions to this score record.

createTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the leaderboard record was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the leaderboard record was updated.

expiryTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the leaderboard record expires.

maxNumScore.description: The maximum number of score updates allowed by the owner.

apiLeaderboardRecord.description: Represents a complete leaderboard record with all scores and associated metadata.

ownerRecords.description: A batched set of leaderboard records belonging to specified owners.

nextCursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prevCursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

rankCount.description: The total number of ranks available.

apiLeaderboardRecordList.description: A set of leaderboard records, may be part of a leaderboard records page or a batch of individual records.

sync.description: Import Steam friends for the user.

apiLinkSteamRequest.description: Link Steam to the current user's account.

limit.title: Max number of results per page

cursor.title: Cursor to retrieve a page of records from

matchId.description: The ID of the match, can be used to join.

authoritative.description: True if it's an server-managed authoritative match, false otherwise.

size.description: Current number of users in the match.

matches.description: A number of matches corresponding to a list operation.

content.description: Content of the notification in JSON.

senderId.description: ID of the sender, if a user. Otherwise 'null'.

createTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the notification was created.

persistent.description: True if this notification was persisted to the database.

cacheableCursor.description: Use this cursor to paginate notifications. Cache this to catch up to new notifications.

apiNotificationList.description: A collection of zero or more notifications.

apiOperator.description:
Operator that can be used to override the one set in the leaderboard.

 - NO_OVERRIDE: Do not override the leaderboard operator.
 - BEST: Override the leaderboard operator with BEST.
 - SET: Override the leaderboard operator with SET.
 - INCREMENT: Override the leaderboard operator with INCREMENT.
 - DECREMENT: Override the leaderboard operator with DECREMENT.

apiStorageObject.description: An object within the storage engine.

collection.description: The collection which stores the object.

key.description: The key of the object within the collection.

version.description: The version hash of the object.

createTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the object was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the object was last updated.

apiStorageObjectAcks.description: Batch of acknowledgements for the storage object write.

cursor.description: The cursor for the next page of results, if any.

apiStoreEnvironment.description:
- UNKNOWN: Unknown environment.
 - SANDBOX: Sandbox/test environment.
 - PRODUCTION: Production environment.
apiStoreEnvironment.title: Environment where a purchase/subscription took place,

apiStoreProvider.description:
- APPLE_APP_STORE: Apple App Store
 - GOOGLE_PLAY_STORE: Google Play Store
 - HUAWEI_APP_GALLERY: Huawei App Gallery
 - FACEBOOK_INSTANT_STORE: Facebook Instant Store
apiStoreProvider.title: Validation Provider,

cursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the next page, if any.

prevCursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page, if any.

apiSubscriptionList.description: A list of validated subscriptions stored by Nakama.

description.description: The description of the tournament. May be blank.

category.description: The category of the tournament. e.g. "vip" could be category 1.

sortOrder.description: ASC (0) or DESC (1) sort mode of scores in the tournament.

size.description: The current number of players in the tournament.

maxSize.description: The maximum number of players for the tournament.

maxNumScore.description: The maximum score updates allowed per player for the current tournament.

canEnter.description: True if the tournament is active and can enter. A computed value.

endActive.description: The UNIX time when the tournament stops being active until next reset. A computed value.

nextReset.description: The UNIX time when the tournament is next playable. A computed value.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

createTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the tournament was created.

startTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the tournament will start.

endTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the tournament will be stopped.

duration.description: Duration of the tournament in seconds.

startActive.description: The UNIX time when the tournament start being active. A computed value.

prevReset.description: The UNIX time when the tournament was last reset. A computed value.

authoritative.description: Whether the leaderboard was created authoritatively or not.

ownerRecords.description: A batched set of tournament records belonging to specified owners.

nextCursor.description: The cursor to send when retireving the next page (optional).

prevCursor.description: The cursor to send when retrieving the previous page (optional).

rankCount.description: The total number of ranks available.

apiTournamentRecordList.description: A set of tournament records which may be part of a tournament records page or a batch of individual records.

username.description: The username of the user's account.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

avatarUrl.description: A URL for an avatar image.

langTag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

location.description: The location set by the user.

timezone.description: The timezone set by the user.

id.description: The id of the user's account.

username.description: The username of the user's account.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

avatarUrl.description: A URL for an avatar image.

langTag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

location.description: The location set by the user.

timezone.description: The timezone set by the user.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

facebookId.description: The Facebook id in the user's account.

googleId.description: The Google id in the user's account.

gamecenterId.description: The Apple Game Center in of the user's account.

steamId.description: The Steam id in the user's account.

online.description: Indicates whether the user is currently online.

edgeCount.description: Number of related edges to this user.

createTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the user was created.

updateTime.description: The UNIX time (for gRPC clients) or ISO string (for REST clients) when the user was last updated.

facebookInstantGameId.description: The Facebook Instant Game ID in the user's account.

appleId.description: The Apple Sign In ID in the user's account.

cursor.description: Cursor for the next page of results, if any.

apiUserGroupList.description: A list of groups belonging to a user, along with the user's role in each group.

apiUsers.description: A collection of zero or more users.

receipt.description: Base64 encoded Apple receipt data payload.

signedRequest.description: Base64 encoded Facebook Instant signedRequest receipt data payload.

apiValidatePurchaseFacebookInstantReques.title: Facebook Instant IAP Purchase validation request

receipt.description: Base64 encoded Apple receipt data payload.

purchaseTime.description: Timestamp when the purchase was done.

createTime.description: Timestamp when the receipt validation was stored in DB.

updateTime.description: Timestamp when the receipt validation was updated in DB.

refundTime.title: Timestamp when the purchase was refunded. Set to UNIX

environment.description: Whether the purchase was done in production or sandbox environment.

seenBefore.description: Whether the purchase had already been validated by Nakama before.

originalTransactionId.description: Purchase Original transaction ID (we only keep track of the original subscription, not subsequent renewals).

purchaseTime.description: UNIX Timestamp when the purchase was done.

createTime.description: UNIX Timestamp when the receipt validation was stored in DB.

updateTime.description: UNIX Timestamp when the receipt validation was updated in DB.

environment.description: Whether the purchase was done in production or sandbox environment.

expiryTime.description: Subscription expiration time. The subscription can still be auto-renewed to extend the expiration time further.

refundTime.description: Subscription refund time. If this time is set, the subscription was refunded.

active.description: Whether the subscription is currently active or not.

collection.description: The collection to store the object.

key.description: The key for the object within the collection.

version.description:
The version hash of the object to check. Possible values are: ["", "*", "#hash#"].

if-match and if-none-match

permissionRead.description: The read access permissions for the object.

permissionWrite.description: The write access permissions for the object.

objects.description: The objects to store on the server.

apiWriteStorageObjectsRequest.description: Write objects to the storage engine.
